video.title: Mike Dean | The Eighth Night | Moog Grandmother
video.description:
Earlier this year, legendary hip-hop producer Mike Dean invited us into his LA home studio to capture the making of what would become “The Eighth Night,” a standout track included in his newly released solo album. 

Watch Dean flex his production prowess by building the track using sounds created with only one instrument: the Moog Grandmother. Every 808-style kick, bassline, lead, and Yeezus-style distortion effect comes from this instrument recorded in a single session. 

Dean's 28-track instrumental mixtape is now available to stream or purchase. For details, visit https://mikedean420.com.

This video contains low frequency harmonic content that cannot be reproduced via phone or laptop transducers. Use a pair of headphones or monitors for an optimal listening experience.  

More about Mike Dean: https://www.therealmikedean.com
More about Grandmother: https://www.moogmusic.com/products/grandmother

All music for "The Eighth Night" written and performed by Mike Dean.
